1.title: Ready or Not, Here Come the Quints!
1.plot: Liz and Daniel have a 2-year-old, but with the arrival of quintuplets, they quickly become parents to half a dozen kids; Liz's contractions come early, and is rushed to the hospital for an emergency C-section, putting the babies at risk.

2.title: Diapergeddon
2.plot: Liz and Daniel bring the first two babies home and chaos immediately ensues; with all of their attention on the quints, Liz and Daniel try to make sure Rowan isn't feeling neglected; Liz gets some upsetting news.

3.title: Mo Babies, Mo Problems
3.plot: Liz and Daniel get to bring home the rest of the babies from the hospital, and they officially become a family of eight; Liz and Daniel's mothers move in to help, but they are still outnumbered by five babies and a rambunctious toddler.

4.title: Quints' First Photo Shoot, Say Cheese!
4.plot: Liz and Daniel hope to pull off their first family photo shoot with five-month-old quints; the family comes together to decorate the nursery for the babies; due to exhaustion, Liz oversleeps and misses a special moment.

5.title: Adventures in Toddler Potty Training
5.plot: Liz and Daniel try to potty train Rowan while keeping up with the quints; Daniel's brothers surprise Liz and Rowan with a playground for the backyard; as Connell struggles to gain weight, Liz and Daniel worry he may require a risky surgery.

6.title: The Quints' First Halloween
6.plot: The Hodges get ready for their first Halloween with a half dozen kids, including matching costumes for the quints; Liz and Daniel are shocked to learn that Nolan, Connell, Liam and Dillon have medical conditions that may require surgery.

imdb.plot outline: Liz and Daniel Hodges always dreamed of having a big family, but the way it turned out is better described as a miracle. Liz used fertility drugs to conceive young son Rowan and turned to the same drugs to try to add a second child. Months later, Rowan had not one sibling but five. The quintuplets -- four boys and one girl -- arrived prematurely and spent many days in a neonatal intensive care unit. "Hodges Half Dozen" chronicles the small-town Texas family, now supersized overnight. The series covers Liz's challenging pregnancy, their NICU journey, and their struggle adjusting to a radically different life.
imdb.title: Hodges Half Dozen
plot: Follow the Hodges, parents Liz and Daniel and son Rowan, as they welcome 5 new babies to their family. We go behind Liz's challenging pregnancy, the Hodges NICU journey and now how they adjust to life as a family of eight.

Liz and Daniel Hodges always dreamed of having a big family, but the way it turned out is better described as a miracle. Liz used fertility drugs to conceive young son Rowan and turned to the same drugs to try to add a second child. Months later, Rowan had not one sibling but five. The quintuplets -- four boys and one girl -- arrived prematurely and spent many days in a neonatal intensive care unit. "_Hodges Half Dozen_ (qv)" chronicles the small-town Texas family, now supersized overnight. The series covers Liz's challenging pregnancy, their NICU journey, and their struggle adjusting to a radically different life.
